content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-10.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position(-10.0, 0.0)
- Connected to lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
- Connected to assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)

### Assembling machine factory at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)

### Electric pole group at position(-15.6, 20.4)
Consists of:
- ElectricityGroup at position(-15.6, 20.4) with multiple small electric poles.

### Pipe groups
Consists of:
- PipeGroup at position(-4.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup at position(-4.5, 23.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
-  Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
-  Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
-  Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
-  Beltgroup (position ) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing boiler
- Ensure that the target location is clear of other entities before attempting to place a boiler.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to undefined entities
- Check for typos or incorrect references to entity names in your code to avoid NameErrors.
